Package org.mrpdaemon.sec.encfs

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EncFSFileProvider
    Interface for a File provider An EncFSFileProvider provides an abstraction for accessing file contents and information in their encrypted form on a local disk or any other storage type.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EncFSBase64  
    EncFSBase64.InputStream
    A Base64.InputStream will read data from another java.io.InputStream, given in the constructor, and encode/decode to/from Base64 notation on the fly.
    EncFSBase64.OutputStream
    A Base64.OutputStream will write data to another java.io.OutputStream, given in the constructor, and encode/decode to/from Base64 notation on the fly.
    EncFSConfig
    Class representing volume configuration data for an EncFS volume.
    EncFSConfigParser
    Parser methods that read and interpret EncFS configuration files.
    EncFSConfigWriter
    Writer methods that write an EncFSConfig into a file
    EncFSCrypto
    Class containing static methods implementing crypto functionality for the rest of the library
    EncFSFile
    Object representing a file in an EncFS volume.
    EncFSFileInfo
    Class representing information about an underlying file
    EncFSFileInputStream
    FileInputStream abstraction that allows decrypted data to be read from a file on an EncFS volume.
    EncFSFileOutputStream
    FilterOutputStream abstraction that allows writing encrypted data to a file on an EncFS volume.
    EncFSInputStream
    FilterInputStream extension that allows decrypted data to be read from a file on an EncFS volume.
    EncFSLocalFileProvider
    Class implementing an EncFSFileProvider for accessing the local filesystem Note that all path parameters are relative to the rootPath provided to the constructor.
    EncFSOutputStream
    FilterOutputStream extension that allows encrypted data to be written to a file on an EncFS volume.
    EncFSPBKDF2Provider
    Abstract class for providing a custom PBKDF2 implementation
    EncFSProgressListener
    Class representing a progress listener for long running operations
    EncFSUtil
    Utility class with static methods to help with various functionality
    EncFSVolume
    Class representing an EncFS volume.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EncFSChecksumException
    Class representing a checksum exception
    EncFSCorruptDataException
    Class representing a corrupt data exception
    EncFSException
    Parent class of all encfs-java exceptions
    EncFSInvalidConfigException
    Class representing an invalid configuration exception
    EncFSInvalidPasswordException
    Class representing an invalid password exception
    EncFSUnsupportedException
    Class representing an unsupported exception
